name: B.L.U.E.: Legend of Water
description:
B.L.U.E.: Legend of Water (ブルー レジェンドオブウォーター) is a Adventure video game published by Hudson Soft released on July 9th, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation.

With the help of my dolphin i saved a guy that was stuck under a rock underwater. I don’t know Japanese but i just looked at the kanji highlighted in yellow and matched it with one option of the triangle button menu. I think the option was “Work together” or something. Amazing description!
